a good  introductory level course!

Please provide English subtitles when conducting an interview in Korean, else it defeats the purpose. And please provide reasons for deducting marks in quizzes. My final quiz review in week 3 shows I answered all the questions correctly, but I still got 98%.

This course was very informative and the instructor definitely presented key concepts which will help me with my career. Thank you! However, a couple of the videos were labeled as private and therefore inaccessible to me. Also, the transcription text had many errors which made it difficult for me to read along with the video, which is how I learn best. So, for these last two reasons, I had to remove one star from the overall value.

I completely enjoyed this unique program International Hospitality and Healthcare Services Marketing taught by Professor Sunmee Choi. As a graduate of Economics and Education,  it has certainly added to my wealth of knowledge. Thank you to Yonsei for offering me this opportunity to be a better individual.

I enjoyed this course because the information is clear and insightful. What makes it more effective and useful is that I took it as part of the International Marketing & Cross Industry Growth Specialization. Maybe If you take this course alone, it will be ok, but not as complete as when you do the whole program. I recommend it either way.

International Hospitality & Healthcare Services Marketing is an Amazing Online course  lectured by Professor Sunmee Choi. The insight explained by her are of immensely helpful to understand how Hospitality and Healthcare service are similar. Both are Human touch oriented service industry which can complement each other . The Course Theory and Visuals have been well organised and examples given are very much individual industry related which also explains how one can merge the aspects of Hospitality  industry into Healthcare Industry. Looking forward for more courses related to Healthcare Industry.
Great fully satisfied

This course helped me realize that not only in the hospitality area we can make our clients have experiences, we can also take them to other levels such as in hospitals so that patients have a better quality in their stay.

Out of all the courses I have followed in Coursera so far, this course provided by the Yonsei University is far more than satisfaction. Perhaps, it's because of the way the professor teaches in which I love the most. Because she is very clear, detailed, and amiable in her lectures, and she sounds interesting and not boring at all. To be honest, I understood a lot, and I took this course mostly to know about the Marketing in Hospitality and I grasped an essential amount of information; thanks to the professor of the Yonsei University. And I'm about to take the course again as well! Thank you!
